entries.claim_text: ON RRP balances peaked at $2.553T on December 30, 2022 and fell below $100B by end of 2024.
Treasury bill yields rose above the ON RRP rate by ~20bps in mid-2023, incentivizing MMF rotation out of RRP.

source.title: FRED 3-Month T-Bill Secondary Rate
source.excerpt: 91-day T-Bill rate exceeded IORB by 18–23bps during June–August 2023.

entries.claim_text: Total Treasury net issuance exceeded $2T in the 12 months following the June 2023 debt ceiling resolution.

source.title: TreasuryDirect Monthly Statement of Public Debt

entries.claim_text: A rapid RRP drain to zero could tighten reserve conditions and reproduce 2019-style repo market stress.

source.title: AI-generated inference
source.excerpt: A rapid RRP drain to zero could tighten reserve conditions and reproduce 2019-style repo market stress.

entries.notes: Analytical inference from BIS and Fed staff working papers; not a stated Fed projection.
